|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = SpecTek;SM1G32V91MD4LMZ-125BT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ROCK64", "Designed in Silicon Valley, California." and "Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "ROCK64 V3.0" and "2019-0626" is silkscreened on board.
*[http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64_Main_Page On '''Pine64''' Wiki] So far there are three different models: :• ROCK64 (1GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (2GB DRAM) :• ROCK64 (4GB DRAM)
{{See also|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3328 @1.5GHz 64-bit :Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A53) Processor *GPU: Mali-450 MP2 (supporting 4K @60fps) :Video decoding via VP9 or 10-bit H265/H264 *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot, :eMMC module socket *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM (''[[SpecTek]]'') *Network: 1x GbE ports (w/ PoE support), :1x FE available via 22-pin Pi-5+ Connector *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB 3.0 Host ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers, 1x 22-pin header *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel or :via PoE via PoE expansion header
==See also== *[[PINE A64+ 2GB]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE A64-LTS]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64-LTS/SOPine_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model A]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Model-A_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64 Model B (3GB)]] • 1GB/2GB/3GB • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE ROCK64 (4GB)]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64 MPage] *[[PINE ROCKPro64]] •[https://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCKPro64 MPage]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
